description: This operation retrieves metadata of a search job, including its progress.

parameters.name: SearchJobIdentifier
parameters.description: Required unique string that specifies the search job.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Returned name of the specified search job.

nested_items.name: SearchScopeSummary
nested_items.description: Returned summary of the specified search job scope, including:
TotalBackupsToScanCount, the number of recovery points returned by the search.
TotalItemsToScanCount, the number of items returned by the search.

nested_items.name: CurrentSearchProgress
nested_items.description: Returns numbers representing BackupsScannedCount, ItemsScanned, and ItemsMatched.

nested_items.name: RecoveryPointsScannedCount
nested_items.description: This number is the sum of all backups that have been scanned so far during a search job.

nested_items.name: ItemsScannedCount
nested_items.description: This number is the sum of all items that have been scanned so far during a search job.

nested_items.name: ItemsMatchedCount
nested_items.description: This number is the sum of all items that match the item filters in a search job in progress.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: A status message will be returned for either a earch job with a status of ERRORED or a status of COMPLETED jobs with issues.

nested_items.name: EncryptionKeyArn
nested_items.description: The encryption key for the specified search job.

nested_items.name: CompletionTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that a search job completed, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of CompletionTime is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the specified search job.

nested_items.name: SearchScope
nested_items.description: The search scope is all backup properties input into a search.

nested_items.name: BackupResourceTypes
nested_items.description: The resource types included in a search.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: BackupResourceCreationTime
nested_items.description: This is the time a backup resource was created.

nested_items.name: CreatedAfter
nested_items.description: This timestamp includes recovery points only created after the specified time.

nested_items.name: CreatedBefore
nested_items.description: This timestamp includes recovery points only created before the specified time.

nested_items.name: SourceResourceArns
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies the source resources.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: BackupResourceArns
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies the backup resources.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: BackupResourceTags
nested_items.description: These are one or more tags on the backup (recovery point).
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ItemFilters
nested_items.description: Item Filters represent all input item properties specified when the search was created.

nested_items.name: S3ItemFilters
nested_items.description: This array can contain CreationTimes, ETags, ObjectKeys, Sizes, or VersionIds objects.

nested_items.name: ObjectKeys
nested_items.description: You can include 1 to 10 values.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the string.

nested_items.name: Operator
nested_items.description: A string that defines what values will be returned.

nested_items.name: Sizes
nested_items.description: You can include 1 to 10 values.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of an item included in one of the search item filters.

nested_items.name: Operator
nested_items.description: A string that defines what values will be returned.

nested_items.name: CreationTimes
nested_items.description: You can include 1 to 10 values.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: This is the timestamp value of the time condition.

nested_items.name: Operator
nested_items.description: A string that defines what values will be returned.

nested_items.name: VersionIds
nested_items.description: You can include 1 to 10 values.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the string.

nested_items.name: Operator
nested_items.description: A string that defines what values will be returned.

nested_items.name: ETags
nested_items.description: You can include 1 to 10 values.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the string.

nested_items.name: Operator
nested_items.description: A string that defines what values will be returned.

nested_items.name: EBSItemFilters
nested_items.description: This array can contain CreationTimes, FilePaths, LastModificationTimes, or Sizes objects.

nested_items.name: FilePaths
nested_items.description: You can include 1 to 10 values.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the string.

nested_items.name: Operator
nested_items.description: A string that defines what values will be returned.

nested_items.name: Sizes
nested_items.description: You can include 1 to 10 values.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of an item included in one of the search item filters.

nested_items.name: Operator
nested_items.description: A string that defines what values will be returned.

nested_items.name: CreationTimes
nested_items.description: You can include 1 to 10 values.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: This is the timestamp value of the time condition.

nested_items.name: Operator
nested_items.description: A string that defines what values will be returned.

nested_items.name: LastModificationTimes
nested_items.description: You can include 1 to 10 values.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: This is the timestamp value of the time condition.

nested_items.name: Operator
nested_items.description: A string that defines what values will be returned.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that a search job was created, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of CompletionTime is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: SearchJobIdentifier
nested_items.description: The unique string that identifies the specified search job.

nested_items.name: SearchJobArn
nested_items.description: The unique string that identifies the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified search job.
